(I just had a super positive contract negotiation experience, but it's easy to see how I could have been hurt without my lawyer's input 😍).
If you don't do your due diligence up front by hiring a lawyer, you are inviting the universe to fuck you. And it will hurt! 😖
"Trust" is irrelevant when it comes to written contracts. All that is relevant is what's written on the page.
Yes, lawyers are expensive. But they pay for themselves in ways you will (hopefully) never see!
You may read through a contract and think you have a full grasp of the terms. You don't! Put your ego aside and hire a lawyer.
Hot tip for you young professionals: never sign a contract (including Employment Agreements) without having it reviewed by a lawyer first!

Yes! All these tiny annoyances (which may not seem big enough to be deal breakers) add up and decrease your chance… https://t.co/rPVlN9iVBb
"I designed/programmed the game" tells me nothing. Be specific enough that I can ask a specific question about that experience.
Another student resume pet peeve: not being specific about one's accomplishments and contributions on school (and side) projects.
One of my pet peeves I see all the time in student resumes: calling oneself an expert in a particular skill. Shows a lack of self-awareness.
You can avoid the common resume mistakes that make it so easy for hiring managers to toss your application in the trash bin 👋📄🗑
If you're a student applying for your first #gamedev job, I'll happily (and honestly) review your resume! 🤓📝

@protomelvin Are you using Unity? ☺️ I'd love to playtest your game, too, whenever you're ready! 😄
@protomelvin I have a few (i.e., too many) projects that I'm bouncing between 😅 A rhythm game, a story exploration game, and a dice game 💀
@protomelvin That sounds fun to design!! ☺️ Are you thinking about what platform(s) to put it on at this stage?
@protomelvin I am! ☺️ But it's also in early pre-production 😅 Too early to show in public 😅
@protomelvin That's a good plan! I should probably do the same 😅 Did you demo your game last night??
@protomelvin Ahh, I was hoping we would run into each other. I didn't expect so many people 😅 Are you going to the Twitch event tonight?
@c_pruett @ericcosky It was great to meet and chat with you both tonight! Enjoy the rest of your time in the city! 🙌
@paullicino It was lovely chatting with you tonight, Paul! Hopefully we'll run into each other again at a future Full Indie ☺️
@ericcosky @c_pruett How long are you guys in town for? Staying for the post-talk drinks tonight? ☺️🍷
